title: Aokiji Saves Smoker! One Piece Episode 622, 623, 624, 625 Reaction!
author: Jamiuwu
description: Reaction video covering Episodes 622-625, featuring the reunion of Momonosuke and Kin'emon, the aftermath of Punk Hazard, and Doflamingo's attack on Smoker with Aokiji's intervention.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through episode 625 including Doflamingo's appearance

title: One Piece Episodes 625, 628-629: End of the Punk Hazard Arc
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: Podcast episode discussing the conclusion of the Punk Hazard arc including episodes 622-625, covering character rankings, arc wrap-up, and the transition to the next arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses the end of Punk Hazard arc through episode 629

title: One Piece Episode #622 Anime Review
author: Fandom Post
description: Contemporary review of Episode 622 describing it as 'a much needed down episode' focused on 'lighthearted moments and fun' with happy montages of everyone enjoying food and company.

title: One Piece | Episode 622 | Review
author: Anime Takeover
description: Episode review noting that nothing major happened in the episode, with some laughs, reunions and answered questions. A major reveal was that Law plans to take down Kaidou.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Reveals Law's plan to defeat Kaidou

title: 620-622: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!, Capture Caesar! General Cannon Blasts! and A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kinemon!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Blog post covering episodes 620-622 with detailed summaries and reactions to the conclusion of the Punk Hazard battles and the reunion of Momonosuke and Kin'emon.

title: One Piece: Why Momonosuke's Devil Fruit Is Considered a Failure by Vegapunk
author: CBR
description: Article explaining the backstory of Momonosuke's artificial devil fruit, why Vegapunk deemed it a failure (due to the pink color), and how it actually performs in practice.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers about Momonosuke's later development and the Wano arc

title: One Piece: Artificial Devil Fruits, Explained
author: Game Rant
description: Comprehensive explanation of artificial devil fruits in One Piece, including Momonosuke's fruit, SMILE fruits, and Vegapunk's research.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses artificial devil fruits throughout the series including later arcs
